title: How to Evolve Your Woobat

steps.headline: Catch a Woobat.
steps.description: They are found in various caves, and they are easy to catch.

steps.headline: Give it the Soothe Bell.
steps.description: This increases Woobat's happiness, which is a key point in evolving it into Swoobat.

steps.headline: Find the person who grooms/massages your Pokémon.
steps.description: This is another way to increase its happiness.

steps.headline: Level it up as much as you can.
steps.description: Rare Candies are an easier way, but decrease gained EVs in stats.

steps.headline: If you have the Bicycle, put Woobat in your party and ride around for a while.
Keep repeating these methods until you have a Swoobat.
Enjoy battling with your newly-evolved Swoobat!

text: Catch a Woobat. They are found in various caves, and they are easy to catch. Give it the Soothe Bell. This increases Woobat's happiness, which is a key point in evolving it into Swoobat. Find the person who grooms/massages your Pokémon. This is another way to increase its happiness. Level it up as much as you can. Rare Candies are an easier way, but decrease gained EVs in stats. If you have the Bicycle, put Woobat in your party and ride around for a while.  Keep repeating these methods until you have a Swoobat.  Enjoy battling with your newly-evolved Swoobat!
